string.text: Stalker, you're getting to the barrier, we are happy to accept any help.
Marked One, come near to us for the calculation and further instructions.
Marked One, come back and occupy the position.
If you spend a night in the village inn the tower, something always happens...
Remember the ines - Engineer wrong twice...
Marked One, be careful. They say the village has a new anomaly - is moving very quickly, besides her, bitch, is not visible.
Attention everyone diluted brains - protect the passage to the radar unit "Monolith", I think you know that they are Strelok and all. Good luck.
In the attack, chaps. Soak scribes.
Our task is completed. Returning to the farm, and there we will settle accounts.
Come on, guys. The path is clear.
Marked One, be careful, or else there'll be a sniper's bullet in your head...
